channel.title: Model Averaging on R Doodles
channel.description: Recent content in Model Averaging on R Doodles

item.title: Model-averaged coefficients of a GLM
item.description: Figure 1: p1 of supplement of Dormann et al library(MuMIn) library(data.table) This is a very quick post as a comment to the statement “For linear models, predicting from a parameter-averaged model is mathematically identical to averaging predictions, but this is not the case for non-linear models…For non-linear models, such as GLMs with log or logit link functions g(x)1, such coefficient averaging is not equivalent to prediction averaging” from the supplement of Dormann et al.
